title: Great little hotel for a short stay in Paris!
text:
The hotel is ideally situated in Montmartre, only a 5 minute walk from the nearest Metro station and a 5 minute walk up to Sacre-Coeur.
Our room was on the ground floor and very clean and relatively spacious. Some noise could be heard from the reception area given the proximity of our room but this was only on occasion and, as we were rarely in the room unless sleeping, it didn't create any issues for us.
The hotel offer free coffee and cake in an afternoon downstairs which is a nice bonus and a welcome break after a busy day sightseeing.
I would definitely recommend the hotel and would have no hesitation on returning on our next trip to Paris.
